text: Dimaadua ga helekai, “Di madagoaa o nia mee aanei ala gaa kila, gei Au gaa wanga gi Gog di gowaa dela e danu iei mee i lodo Israel, i di gowaa maalama dela e hulahula ai nia daangada laa laa, i baahi dua di Tai Mmade. Gog mo ana gau dauwa huogodoo e danu i golo, gei di gowaa deelaa ga hagaingoo bolo ‘Di Gowaa o Digau Dauwa a Gog’.
